english: Needy and handicapped people depend on government relief for their support .
chinese: 穷人和残疾人依靠政府的救济维持生计。

english: They would run a real plant where men and women could earn a living doing useful work .
chinese: 他们要开设一间真正的工厂，使得男人和女人都能够在里面做有用的工作来维持生计。

english: The "unwanted american population" that is systematically discouraged by advertising-supported media is not small .
chinese: 这种“多余的美国人”为数不少，靠广告维持生计的传播媒介故意冷落他们。

english: Gain a living ; gain extra credits in school
chinese: 维持生计；在学校里修得额外的学分

english: A document confirming the necessary subsistence
chinese: 具有维持生计能力的证明文件；
维持生计造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Now the world cup is over how will you make a living
chinese: 现在世界杯结束了你还怎么维持生计？

english: To make a living , verne had to write and sell stories
chinese: 为了维持生计，凡尔赛不得不写小说。

english: It ' s so hard to make a living like this
chinese: 在里面很难像现在这样维持生计

english: Their mother runs a noodle shop to raise th . .
chinese: 父亲去世后,日子难挨,他们母亲经营面摊维持生计

english: He has barely enough money to live on
chinese: 他的钱仅够勉强维持生计。

english: Made just enough money to survive
chinese: 挣得钱仅仅能维持生计

english: He manages to keep the ends meet by cutting down expense on dress
chinese: 答案：他削减在服装方面的费用以维持生计。

english: I guess if it fails you always have your regular job to rely on
chinese: 我想即使你失败了，你还有份正常工作来维持生计。

english: How do you think l feel having to do dinner theater to pay the bills
chinese: 我要靠做晚?剧院来维持生计,你知道我的感受吗

english: How can you afford your life and all the handbills and postage
chinese: 就靠这点钱你们俩人就可以在维持生计之外买传单和附寄费？
